com.st.BlueSTSDK.Features

Class FeatureAudioADPCM

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.st.BlueSTSDK.Feature
      • com.st.BlueSTSDK.Features.FeatureAudioADPCM

  • public class FeatureAudioADPCM
extends Feature
    Feature that contains the compressed audio data acquired form a microphone.

      • getAudio

        public static boolean getAudio(Feature.Sample sample,
                               short[] outData)
        extract the audio sample from a feature sample, this function is useful for avoid to allocate a new array at each sample
        Parameters:
        sample - ble sample
        outData - array where store the audio sample
        Returns:

      • extractData

        protected Feature.ExtractResult extractData(long timestamp,
                                            byte[] data,
                                            int dataOffset)
        extract the audio data from the node raw data, in this case it read an array of 40 shorts.
        Specified by:
        extractData in class Feature
        Parameters:
        data - array where read the Field data (a 20 bytes array)
        dataOffset - offset where start to read the data (0 by default)
        timestamp - data timestamp
        Returns:
        number of read bytes (20) and data extracted (the audio information, the 40 shorts array)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the data array has not the correct number of elements

      • notifyUpdate

        protected void notifyUpdate(Feature.Sample sample)
        Description copied from class: Feature
        call the method Feature.FeatureListener.onUpdate(Feature, Feature.Sample) for each listener that subscribe to this feature.

        each call will be run in a different thread

        If you extend the method overwrite the method Feature.update_priv(long, byte[], int) you have to call this method for notify to the user the new sample

        Overrides:
        notifyUpdate in class Feature
        Parameters:
        sample - new data that we have to notify to the listener

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Description copied from class: Feature
        print the last data received by this feature
        Overrides:
        toString in class Feature
        Returns:
        string with the feature data
